chat.content: Brief presentation for customers. My idea is automation of presentation. You just type your idea then software propose your steps to create presentation and try to automatize it.
Give me list of slldes for presentation

Sure! Here are some slides to consider for a presentation:

1. Cover slide with title and presenter's name
2. Agenda slide outlining the topics to be covered
3. Problem statement slide highlighting the issue or challenge being addressed
4. Solution overview slide outlining the proposed solution
5. Benefits slide explaining the advantages of the proposed solution
6. Use cases/examples slide showing how the solution can be applied
7. Features slide highlighting key components of the proposed solution
8. Roadmap slide outlining the implementation timeline 
9. Cost/budget slide breaking down the financial aspects of the solution
10. Conclusion slide summarizing the main points and call to action.

Of course, the specific slides and content of a presentation will vary based on the topic and audience. But this list provides a solid framework to consider.
